name: waver
author: Rick Reynolds
description: Creates an ideal waveform timeseries file.

inputs.description: Sets waveform to Cox special [default]
inputs.name: Cox special waveform

inputs.description: Sets waveform to form t^b * exp(-t/c) (cf. Mark Cohen)
inputs.name: Gamma waveform

inputs.description: Sets waveform to the expression given, which should depend on the variable 't'.
inputs.name: Expression for custom waveform

inputs.description: Sets waveform to the values read from the file wname, which should be a single column .1D file. The dt value is the time step (in seconds) between lines in wname.
inputs.name: File for waveform values

inputs.description: Sets delay time to # seconds [2]
inputs.name: Delay time

inputs.description: Sets rise time to # seconds [4]
inputs.name: Rise time

inputs.description: Sets fall time to # seconds [6]
inputs.name: Fall time

inputs.description: Sets undershoot to # times the peak [0.2]
inputs.name: Undershoot

inputs.description: Sets time to restore from undershoot [2]
inputs.name: Restore time

inputs.description: Sets the parameter 'b' to # [8.6]
inputs.name: Gamma parameter b

inputs.description: Sets the parameter 'c' to # [0.547]
inputs.name: Gamma parameter c

inputs.description: Sets the delay time to # seconds [0.0]
inputs.name: Gamma delay time

inputs.description: Sets peak value to # [100]
inputs.name: Peak value

inputs.description: Sets time step of output AND input [0.1]
inputs.name: Time step

inputs.description: '-TR' is equivalent to '-dt'
inputs.name: TR time step

inputs.description: Output data in 2 columns: 1=time 2=waveform (useful for graphing) [default is 1 column=waveform]
inputs.name: XY output flag

inputs.description: Read timeseries from *.1D formatted 'infile'; convolve with waveform to produce output
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Read timeseries from command line DATA; convolve with waveform to produce output
inputs.name: Inline input data

inputs.description: Read discrete stimulation times from the command line and convolve the waveform with delta-functions at those times.
inputs.name: Tstim input data

inputs.description: Read time blocks when stimulus is 'on' (=1) from the command line and convolve the waveform with with a zero-one input.
inputs.name: When input data

inputs.description: Output a timeseries with NN points; if this option is not given, then enough points are output to let the result tail back down to zero.
inputs.name: Number of output points

inputs.description: Output version information and exit.
inputs.name: Version flag

output-files.description: The output filename for the result of the waveform.
output-files.name: Output Filename
